page.title: 19Local news
page.content: {Articles of local news taken from {"Community Link" (12/6/85) { {Creigiau Scouts: The first meeting of the Scout troop was held in Creigiau village, Church hall Fri. There were 22 Scouts present. All enjoyed an evening's entertainment. It is intended to run the troop meeting every Fri. evening, same venue. { {Greigiau Carnival: Sat. 6th July groups participating include Cubs,Scouts, Keep Fit, Brownies. Prize for best float. Stalls include beer, sweets, flowers, books, games. { {Creigiau W.I.:}Tuesday 6th July, talk by Mr. G. Nash on St. Fagan's Folk Museum.
